channel.title: Codes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Codes on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Code
item.description: All of the project’s code is available open source in the STELLA GitHub Project. Below you find a short list of the most important repositories: The STELLA server is the central instance of the infrastructure. It handles the user administration, provides access to a dashboard, it automatically updates the STELLA app, and it hosts the database with user interaction logs. The STELLA app is deployed at sites that want to conduct IR and recommender experiments and evaluate them with user interactions.
